General.Name: Comprehensive Healthcare Systems Inc
General.Description: Comprehensive Healthcare Systems, Inc. engages in the development of customized healthcare administrative software solutions. The company offers NOVUS 360, a suite of applications, including benefits admin software, third party administrator, data and pricing transparency, medical management, pharmacy benefit management, and financial recovery. It provides licensing and maintenance services. The company serves healthcare industry, including insurance companies, hospitals, doctors, and labor unions. Comprehensive Healthcare Systems, Inc. is headquartered in New York, New York.
General.Address: 2025 Lincoln Highway, Edison, NJ, United States, 08817
